objects.text:
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• High-Precision Electronic Viewfinder
• Fast Autofocus System

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Simple
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-style design with modern functionality
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS II sensor for exceptional image quality
• High-precision electronic viewfinder with real-time preview
• Fast autofocus system for capturing decisive moments
• Premium build quality with durable metal construction
• Multiple manual control dials for precise settings adjustment
• Compatible with Fujifilm's renowned X-mount lens system
• Compact and lightweight design perfect for travel photography
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing
• Full HD video recording capabilities
• Tiltable LCD screen for creative angle shooting
• Film simulation modes to achieve classic Fujifilm looks

banner_details:
This banner presents a sleek and professional promotional layout for a camera product. The background features a dark gradient (deep charcoal to slate gray) enhanced by geometric accents, abstract lines, and low-opacity circle overlays on both sides for visual interest. At the center-right, the "product_image" layer showcases a high-resolution camera image, angled to highlight the lens. The bold "heading" at the top left establishes the brand with a modern sans-serif font in white, followed by the orange "subheading" emphasizing simplicity and professionalism. Below is a "description" text block that highlights technical features. The standout "price" in vibrant orange grabs attention, paired with the "tagline" in white to build urgency. A solid orange "cta_background" button with “cta” invites user action.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black: #000000
- Dark Gray: #1A1A1A
- Charcoal: #333333
- Vibrant Orange: #FF6B00
- Pure White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image of the Fujifilm X-T10 camera showcases a sleek and professional color palette that emphasizes modern design and precision. Dominated by matte black (#1C1C1C) and deep charcoal gray (#2F2F2F), the body exudes sophistication. Silver metallic accents (#C0C0C0) on dials and lens rings provide a sharp contrast, adding depth and visual interest. Hints of red (#D94F4F) and orange (#F7941D) in the lens details give subtle highlights that guide the eye without overwhelming the design. The glass element features reflections with greenish hints (#C5E7D4), blending smoothly to enhance the camera’s lens clarity. This color harmony is ideal for high-end, tech-savvy advertisements.
